comments.comment:
[21u-na]
Thomas helped to avoid the same issue when backporting to 21.

Hi [~tschatzl]
I see you had to backout the first backport.
I would like to understand the reason for this to properly backport this to jdk21u.
Obviously I can not see the code.
Do I need to adapt the coding somewhere? My draft PR https://github.com/openjdk/jdk21u-dev/pull/505
so far passed all our testing.
Thanks and best regards, Goetz.
